item.title: Easy Video Record for Youtube (Female only) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are a fast growing Youtube channel that focuses on doing ASMR videos. Currently we are in search of female YouTube content creator to join our team. The ideal candidate should be good-looking, confident in front of the camera. This is a simple job of recording a video while blow drying your hair, we'll give you further instructions.

   Requirements:
    - High quality camera / phone that can shoot in 4K
    - Рepresentative, neat environment / cozy ambience.
    - Follow guidelines and is detail-oriented.
    - Can give unique ideas for content and help to grow the channel.
    - Ability to attract viewers
    - Confident showing face on youtube. (without talking)
    - Has hair dryer & vacuum cleaner available at home, preferrably new model ones. (it will be needed for our videos).
    

The job is simple and fit for beginners, you don't need to be a professional. The most important for us is to work with confident and good-looking people. The payments will be per video recordings. (There will be a Bonus Payment, if you are good)
Further this can turn into a long-term opportunity for you. Please attach a picture of yourself or previous content. (Very Important)

Applicants without photos attached won't be checked!!!



    

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 25, 2024 22:59 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design, Beauty & Health Photography, Beauty, Instagram
Skills: YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design, Beauty & Health Photography, Beauty, Instagram
Country: Bulgaria
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a creative video editor for a short story - Upwork
item.description:
I'm in search of an exceptional video editor  adept at crafting short, humorous stories similar to the style showcased in this example: [Example Video Link](https://youtu.be/jc3vulOUtcw?si=f1rFDcY-7LGxNS1-).

**Responsibilities:**
- Develop scenes voice and sfx
- Deliver 5 to 7 stories each week, with the potential for more if possible.

**Requirements:**
- Please provide your rate per story, as this is intended to be a long-term collaboration.
- Submit examples of your previous work, or feel free to create a new sample story as a demonstration of your capabilities.

**Eligibility Criteria:**
- Include relevant samples with your application.
- Must have a job success rate

I look forward to reviewing your submissions and exploring a potential collaboration.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 25, 2024 22:46 UTC

Skills: Video Editing

item.title: Social Media Support for new men's health podcast - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a part-time Social Media Manager to support our new podcast launch.

You will be responsible for creating:
* Managing our social media accounts (using Later.com social media calendar)
* Focus on effective content creation for INSTAGRAM and LINKEDIN initially. Likely activating TikTok and others soon.
* Image/video asset management (weekly social clip creation via Opus or Riverside)
* Setup and manage our email campaigns promoting the podcast (then future membership offerings to come)
* Developing our brand voice and overall social POV
* Support with blog content development, AI content creation tools, content partnership efforts etc.
* Managing social calendar updates in Asana, tracking team deliverables etc.
* Responsible for creation (with AI tools) and editing of show notes for each episode

Requirements:
* This role requires a strong understanding of social media management and social marketing strategies
* You have the ability to plan, accept feedback and then execute the plan
* You should be proficient in conducting research, increasing engagement,
* Reasonable proficiency in graphic design tools (e.g. Canva)
* Strong communication and writing skills (we like grammar here)
* Ability to work collaboratively within a small, lean team
* Reasonable familiarity with podcast tools such as Podbean, Buzzsprout, Opus, Patreon, Chatable etc

Also amazing if you:
* Are familiar with the podcasting industry and the world of mental/emotional health a big plus!
* Have a sense of humor (we "laugh with" not at)
* Can edit video/audio

About us
* Podcast: Halftime with Jon
* Website: www.halftime.network
* Instagram: @halftimewithjon
* Season 1 Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o72MEHESPxM




Posted On: June 25, 2024 22:41 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:LinkedIn Campaign Manager, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, LinkedIn Marketing, Instagram Marketing
Skills: LinkedIn Campaign Manager, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, LinkedIn Marketing, Instagram Marketing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a video editor to edit videos for Youtube, Instagram, and TikTok. These are music videos and clips to promote a musician and for my company as well, for two accounts. Important to have experience with Youtube, Instagram, and Tiktok.

You will be editing videos with audio from the songs, making sure they align. You will also be color grading the videos to make sure they look and professional. And lastly adding text to videos when useful/necessary.

Then you will be uploading some of the full version videos onto youtube where you will need to know what tags and keywords to put to get the most exposure.

Looking to pay around $500-600 a month, negotiable depending on experience. Pay increases possible if the work is great and we're getting good results.

Our goals is to create clips from each song around 30 seconds to promote the full songs on Youtube or spotify as much as possible. As well as growing subscribers and followers.

In message please put what video editing software you have experience using as well as examples of videos you have edited. And what your Youtube experience is like.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 22:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Short Form Video Editor for Real Estate Entrepreneur - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a talented and creative Instagram Short Form Video Editor to join our team and work closely with a dynamic real estate entrepreneur. This role is ideal for someone who has a keen eye for detail, a passion for real estate, and the ability to create engaging and visually appealing content. The successful candidate will be responsible for producing short, high-quality videos tailored for Instagram that effectively highlight real estate properties, market insights, and entrepreneurial activities.

Responsibilities:

Create engaging short form videos (15-60 seconds) for Instagram, showcasing real estate properties, market trends, and entrepreneurial insights.
Collaborate with the real estate entrepreneur to understand the vision and goals for each video project.
Edit raw footage into compelling videos, ensuring high production quality and adherence to brand guidelines.
Add appropriate music, text, graphics, and effects to enhance video content.
Optimize videos for Instagram, ensuring the best possible visual and audio quality.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in Instagram content and real estate marketing to continually improve and innovate.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 22:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Promotional Video - Timelapse Style - Upwork
item.description:
I have screen recordings of my team working on our projects and I would like to cut and compile them into a promotional video that can be used on repeat on a monitor at a conference.

What I am thinking but open to suggestions.
- Stitching the videos together in small clips of time lapse form
- In between having intermissions with maybe the recording becoming faded back and text being prominent with our services  and locations we work in.
- Then the text will fade back out and time lapse of the work will continue.
- ADD OUR COMPANY LOGO IN AS A WATER MARK
- ADDING MUSIC WOULD BE AWESOME TOO

again this will be on repeat.

Here is a link to the videos. https://irridesignstudio.egnyte.com/fl/DcINyWUDjO

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

item.title: Create Short Personal Story Video for Instagram and TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video story creator to produce a short video for Instagram and TikTok. The video should tell a personal story and captivate the audience. This could be a story about overcoming challenges, achievements, or any other interesting aspect of your life. The video should be visually appealing, engaging, and well-edited.

I have seen a style I like. Want to work with someone who gets the idea and has done something similar.
I saw another post and wish I had kept a record. It was telling a success story of an individual with pictures from his past and place of birth and how he made a success from his life and business.

I will tell our story in more detail to the interesting candidates. I will also respond to those that have read the job task carefully and have responded with interest and examples.

    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Storytelling
    - Creativity
    - Familiarity with Instagram and TikTok platforms

    If you have a passion for videography and can create compelling content for social media platforms, we want to hear from you!

    Size: Small
    Duration: Under 1 month
    Expertise: Expert

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 25, 2024 22:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing
Country: Cyprus
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a talented and versatile Social Media Manager and Content Creator to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for social media, content creation, and driving engagement growth. Experience with video and photography agencies is a plus.

Responsibilities:

Develop and implement social media strategies to increase followers and engagement across various platforms.
Create, schedule, and post engaging content, including images, videos, and reels, tailored to our target audience.
Update and optimize social media bios and profiles.
Craft compelling social media posts and stories that resonate with clients in the education industry.
Monitor social media trends and adjust strategies accordingly.
Create and edit reels for Instagram.
Manage and grow our presence on YouTube (video editing experience is a plus).
Provide proof of previous social media account growth.
Requirements:

Proven experience in growing social media accounts with tangible results.
Strong understanding of social media platforms, including Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube.
Excellent content creation skills, including writing, graphic design, and video editing.
Experience with video and photography agencies is a plus.
Strong communication skills and ability to engage with our audience effectively.
Ability to analyze social media metrics and adjust strategies for optimal results.
Creative mindset with attention to detail.
Mandatory Requirement:

Please provide proof of growing social media accounts.
Experience in video editing and YouTube management is a plus.
Test:
To ensure you've read the entire job post, please start your response with #IGreels.

Focus:
Our focus is on clients within the education industry, and we are looking for someone who understands this sector well and can create content that appeals to this audience.

How to Apply:
If you meet the above requirements and are passionate about social media management and content creation, we would love to hear from you. Please respond with #IGreels and include your portfolio or examples of your previous work, especially showcasing social media growth and any relevant experience with video and photography agencies.

We look forward to seeing how you can help us grow and engage with our audience!

Hourly Range: $4.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 22:15 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter/X, Social Media Advertising, Retargeting, Facebook Ads Manager, LinkedIn Campaign Manager, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Instagram Story
Skills: YouTube, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter/X, Social Media Advertising, Retargeting, Facebook Ads Manager, LinkedIn Campaign Manager, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Instagram Story
Country: United States
